component.name: org.richfaces.InplaceInput
component.description: The <rich:inplaceInput> is an input component used for displaying and editing data inputted.

facet.name: controls
facet.description: Defines the contols contents. Related attributes are "saveControlIcon" and "cancelControlIcon"

component.properties:
layout java.lang.String Defines how the component is displayed in the layout. Possible values are "block", "inline". Default value is "inline". "inline"
maxInputWidth java.lang.String Sets the maximum width of the input field. Default value is "500px". "500px"
minInputWidth java.lang.String Sets the minimum width of the input field. Default value is "40px". "40px"
inputWidth java.lang.String Sets width of the input field
defaultLabel java.lang.String The attribute is used to display text while value is undefined ""
showControls boolean Serves to display "save" and "cancel" controls. Default value is "false". false
editEvent java.lang.String Provides an option to assign an JavaScript action that initiates the change of the state. Default value is "onclick". "onclick"
controlsVerticalPosition java.lang.String Positions the controls vertically. Possible values are "bottom","center" and "top". Default value is "center" "center"
controlsHorizontalPosition java.lang.String Positions the controls horizontally. Possible values are "left", "center", "right". Default value is "right". "right"
oneditactivation java.lang.String Provides a possibility to assign JavaScript on edit state activation
onviewactivation java.lang.String Provides a possibility to assign JavaScript on view state activation
oneditactivated java.lang.String HTML: script expression; edit state is activated
onviewactivated java.lang.String HTML: script expression; view state is activated
selectOnEdit boolean Makes the input field select when switched to edit state. Default value is "false" false
tabindex int Serves to define the tabbing order
saveControlIcon java.lang.String Defines custom save icon
cancelControlIcon java.lang.String Defines custom cancel icon
styleClass java.lang.String Corresponds to the HTML class attribute
viewClass java.lang.String CSS style class for view state
editClass java.lang.String CSS style class for edit state
changedClass java.lang.String CSS style class for changed state
controlClass java.lang.String CSS style class for controls
viewHoverClass java.lang.String CSS style class for hovered text in view state
changedHoverClass java.lang.String CSS style class for hovered text in changed state
controlPressedClass java.lang.String CSS style class for pressed press controls
controlHoverClass java.lang.String CSS style class for hovered control
onchange java.lang.String HTML: script expression; the element value was changed
onselect java.lang.String HTML: script expression; the onselect event occurs when you select some menu item
onfocus java.lang.String HTML: script expression; the element got the focus
onblur java.lang.String HTML: script expression; the element lost the focus
oninputclick java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is clicked
oninputdblclick java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a pointer button is double-clicked
oninputkeydown java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed down
oninputkeypress java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a key is pressed and released
oninputkeyup java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a key is released
oninputmousedown java.lang.String HTML: script expression; a pointer button is pressed down
oninputmousemove java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved within
oninputmouseout java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved away
oninputmouseover java.lang.String HTML: a script expression; a pointer is moved onto
oninputmouseup java.lang.String HTML: script expression; a pointer button is released
label java.lang.String A localized user presentable name for this component.
maxlength int Specifies the maximum number of digits that could be entered into the input field. The maximum number is unlimited by default.
&html_events; &ui_input_attributes;
localValueSet boolean
valid boolean
